title: The best beach in neil island
review_text:
The best beach in Neil Island is Bharathpur which looks exactly as a painting exhibiting beauty at the higher level. Among all my favourite beaches in India, Bharathpur has a separate space mainly because the beach does not produce any waves . Even if you venture 70- 80 m insto the sea still you will hardly be neck deep in water . We [ my wife , my son and i ] bought baloon lifbouy Ring and kept floating in the beach from 8 am to 5pm . After visiting at least 50 different beaches in various parts of india I have not seen a beach this calm . An ideal beach for a waterphile to play in. 

The extensive Bay of Bengal is beautifully lulled by the vast greenery and long stretches of white sand on the shore and tourists from all over the world love Bharathpur because of its backdrop unimaginably designed by the creator. The lagoon with shallow and clear water is an ideal space for family to have fun and enjoy the level best. 

We did glassbottom boat ride as well here . More

title: Feast to the eyes
review_text: I loved this beach the most for its clear white sands and crystal clear waters. It is simply stunning and one can easily sit and stare into the sea for hours. They also have a floating walkway that juts into the sea and one can lounge around there. I had been there around 10 ish in the morning, when it is pleasant to sit / lie down on the walkway and gaze out, or enjoy dipping your legs into the water. One can swim in the water as well. Depending on the tide, the corals may be right below the water surface providing a nice spot for photography (some travelers were getting themselves clicked in the water and seemed like they are either sitting / lying down / standing on the surface of water). I was really excited to go on a glass boat ride but unfortunately they were not operational owing to cloudy weather. Next time for sure! More

title: Sun and Surf
review_text:
• Went to the Bharatpur Beach for Glass bottom Boat ride and the weather initially was scorching hot. But became very pleasant after the rain. 
• Carry a pair of change to the beach, if you intend to take sea bath and an umbrella or a hat. 
• Only 2G works here. No phone connectivity. Only BSNL is functional and sometimes Vodafone, if you are lucky enough. 
• Best to wear cool light summer clothing, slippers, sunglasses, hat, sunscreen and take a change of clothes, like in any other beach. 
• The water is unpolluted and soothing. 
• No sun beds and umbrella available. 
• You may buy a T-shirt and shorts there for about INR 100-300/-, if you don't carry clothes. 
• Fruits and light local snacks only, no food joints or shacks. More

title: I wonder how a beach can b sooo awesome....though its near the jetty
review_text:
The beach is really awesome.. crystal clear water.went for water activities...snorkeling was great especially when it was raining n we cud see the underwater corals n huge collection of different types of marine ltd.simply awesome experience it was... 
Advice-go for scuba in Havelock n snorkeling here in bharatpur beach. 
Lovely memory

title: Sparkling blue waters of Bharatpur beach- must visit
review_text: Its a fun beach for all. I visited with kids and did jetski and scuba diving. Must visit because sea is shallow and not much waves . Safe to play with kids and also try lots of water sports. Banana ride is a lot of fun... the water is clean and totally blue.

title: Beautiful beach with abundant mangroves
review_text: A rare combination of beautiful beach with abundant shades, flat beaches are safe for bathing, rich in corals and sea species. It offers some water sports activities and a glass base boat ride where in you can see the corals and sea animals without getting wet. Scuba diving is worth and better than Havelock. Beach side small eateries and souvenir soaps add to the value

title: Awwwwsome !!! Never seen anything so beautiful!!
review_text:
Awesome!! Says it all !! 
Beautiful beach with Crystal clear blue water. In fact it has so many shades of blue that you just can't get enough of it. 
Shallow and safe beach. You can walk inside for a long distance. Almost like a big swimming pool. Very safe for kids. My kids thoroughly enjoyed. 
The water activities are safe and well managed and decently priced. 
I enjoyed this beach more than Havelock island!!

title: Honeymoon
review_text: One can see live corals very near to the sea beach. Must do glass boat ride here. This beach is suitable for swimming but after 10am it's not appropriate because of low tide.

title: Few water sports are available.
review_text: We can enjoy the water sports available. But the visit must be atleast before 2.00pm. Water sports are almost closed in the after noon.

title: a must visit
review_text: The sports facilities are amazing. The glass boat ride was truly memorable. The sand is very soft and my daughter and wife almost entered a 100 met stretch

title: Fun place for kids
review_text:
At this beach the tide is very low, kids will enjoy playing in waters in here. 
Many Jet Skying, Boat trip, fishing, sucba diving, etc., are available here. Souvenir shops here are good too, one can spend more time in here.

title: A serene sojourn
review_text: The beach is a witness to the clearest waters in the Andamans. It is a shallow water beach where one can be safe to walk approximately 500m into the ocean and still not be submerged more than the waist. The place has facilities for water sports at deserving prices and also souvenir shops which sell souveniers at very low prices.

title: Beautiful Beach, Crystal clear Water, Best Beach in Neil
review_text:
This was our first beach in Andaman. We were mesmerized by the it's beauty, calmness, cleanliness, clear water.... 

One can do all water sports activities.... In my opinion, if you are visiting Havelock, do the water sports there and enjoy the beach by relaxing, swimming.... 

Don't forget to have some coconut water 

Changing rooms and washroomsare available at minor cost 

When in Neil, spend more time at Bharatpur Beach compared to other 3 Beaches

title: Shallow water. Wear footwear into water.
review_text: Shallow water. No waves. Absolutely safe. But lots of coral. Going barefoot into water is the worst thing that you can do.

title: Beach for some water acitvity
review_text: We went to this beach in the afternoon by then it was low tide because of which most of the water activities were closed. So do visit this place before lunch to enjoy water sports. Because it was low tide we did walk into the sea for a long distance. It is a good beach.

title: A beach of dream
review_text: It will change your views towards beach hopping..A perfect beach for couples as well as seniors..After beholding it shall occasionally come to your dreams..

title: Excellent
review_text: Excellent beach for water sports and entertainment. You can do glass bottom boat ride and scuba diving

title: Early Morning Visit!
review_text: Our auto guy (Shekar - 9933272996) promptly arrived at 6.30am to take us to Bharatpur beach. Any mode of transport that you hire on these islands will drop as well as pick you up. This beach is not known for sunrise and so we were the only ones there at that time. Even the dogs sleeping on the beach had not woken up. My husband took the kids and went swimming into the sea. The sea was quite shallow even though it looked like they had gone far in. This beach is very close to the jetty and all the water activities take place here. Even though the waters looked clear, we found the beach quite littered compared to Lakshmanpur Beach. We tried the jet ski and banana boat ride and my husband and the kids tried snorkeling on their own as they had their own snorkeling sets. However, they did not see a lot of fishes compared to Jolly Buoy and Havelock. What we enjoyed most about this beach was that the waters were still and we had the beach entirely to ourselves since we had gone so early. More

title: Clear and Clear water
review_text:
You can see clean and clear blue water in the sea. Many water sport acitivities are available. We did Scuba diving here. Cost (Rs 4200) for deep diving at 12 feet down level. They take you in a boat and then make you dive. It was a different experience. It includes free photographs and videos. 

You can go walking on the beach and enjoy with water. Its a lively place and some shops are also present.

title: Beautiful beach close to Neil Jetty.
review_text: Water sport activities are present.Water close to the beach is shallow.you need to walk a lot to get neck deep water.Quite clear water,lovely for scuba and snorkeling.

title: Lovely marine life
review_text: Do go out snorkeling at Bharatpur. Take the boats and venture out away from the main. crowded area. We saw some amazing corals and lots of fish, including the lovely blue Tang. We opted for a glass open boat ride + snorkeling package and were very happy with our decision.

title: Excellent beach
review_text: A fantastic and a very clear beach... A must go place,water over here is absolutely blue and it's treat for eyes to see the natural beauty

title: Water activities or Just Relax
review_text: You could do a sea walk (Just walk) for 100 meters and still no risk. Low water level, clean water ,white sand. Take clothes with you as you would definitely like to do water activities or just relax in water. Eco changing rooms are available at the end of the beach and are free. You have free shower as well. So leave everything at hotel and go to this beach with a pair of clothes.

title: Beach for water sports
review_text:
This beach in neil island is nearby the ferry port, 
the water sport activites are available at this beach....

title: nothing much to do here
review_text: this beach has water sports. but after visiting Havelock, u don't feel much excited about this beach. water sports are good in havelock

title: Beachy beach
review_text: One can go and do water sports here too. The beach has a lot of shops to shop from. The beach is not very clean.

title: Family should love to visit
review_text:
Excellent Shade from trees right on the beach, Good water sports, Well meaning toilets & Changing rooms, Health & Aesthetic food outlets, Cheap & clean Beach side accommodation.......nice ettiquetes of most families around.....High tide in the morning & a turn around in sight consequent to Low tide in the After noon, Good A.C. Taxi even for a very short distance from Jetty.......well do not ask for more. 

It is possible for arriving in the morning & leaving by evening. This is the only point in Neil Island

title: Worth visiting this Beach
review_text: Beautiful, Heaven. the Green-blue water sliding down during low tide and you get clear beautiful white sand to walk on the sea bed. walk along the beach (right side) to see the beautiful washed out corals and shells. if you have not bought anything from North bay then you can pay some premium to buy from here.

title: Good place for scuba diving
review_text: This beach is a good place for scuba diving. Visit this place in morning only so that you can see good views around the place and good coral reefs inside the water.

title: Superb Beach
review_text: It's amazing beach. Water is crystal clear. Sand is white. Andaman is having finest beaches in India.

title: Beautiful bustling beach!!
review_text: If you wish to see most of the water activity center in Neil, this is the beach you need to be at! Snorkeling, glass bottom boat, jet ski, banana boat and what not! The agents will catch hold of you the moment you park your vehicle trying to book the activity through them. All of them have same rates, they will just take you to the association counter to get the activity booked. Snorkelling, jet ski for 500rs for 15 mins snorkel. Lots of stalls selling curios made of sea shells and local materials. Food stalls selling maggie, samosas, jhal muri, mango chat, tropical fruit chats, coconut water, tea etc etc. Lots of shade available to lie down and relax. At low tide you need to go at least 150-200 m to get shoulder depth water. There is a small floating platform available for swimmers which take you in the water avoiding you getting injured by the rocks n corals and damage them too. More

title: Beach with water activities in Neil
review_text:
This beach offers most of the water activities like jet ski, Glassbottom boat ride etc. 
We were only chillimg at the sea shore here and dint take do sports. 

The satisfaction we got doing Glassbottom boat ride in Jollybouy is enough for a lifetime. 

Jetski did look very good here compared to the one in goa. 
There are enough changing rooms and washroom in this beach. 

You can buy T shirts for 100 -200 INR here.. they are pretty good :-)

title: Calm Waters
review_text: Sea water at this beach is very calm and you can enjoy a very good swim here. All the glass boats also take you from this beach. This beach is visible when you land at Neil jetty from Havelock. The tour operators of glass boats don't give up on you even if you say no. But they were not nosy. I understand tourism is one of the prime way of earning in such island. People were good and gave us heavy discount since that was their last boat for the day and few other tips of the island.

title: Beautiful beach
review_text: Good time to visit is high tide. many shops are available near the shore. few water sports available.

title: Nice & Clean beach
review_text: Nice & huge front beach , Clean beach we went during high tide so water as upto to the front & but during noon water was almost 500 meters away where it was in the morning, so better to go during high tide, good Marine life you can watch thru glass bottom boat

title: Blue water with sports activities
review_text: This is the only beach in Neil where both swimming andcwater sports activity is available...make sure you come early as sea recedes in low tide after 1 pm...we did snorkelling and glass button ride here - locals organise the water sports... Excellent viewing of coral reefs and marine life seen...avoid doing scuba here as no good agency is availble in this beach for scuba dive..its better to do scuba in havelock...

title: Beatiful Beach & watersports
review_text: The beach is very beautiful. The water has very beautiful shades. There are beautiful fishes & corals inside the water. You can experience these with special glass bottom boat rides. Other water activities such as snorkeling, jet sky, banana etc are also available. This beach very near to Neil Island jetty. You can enjoy shopping in local stalls. Also food, coconut water, etc. Changing rooms toilets are available.

title: Coral reef was pretty interesting.
review_text: The glass-bottomed boat ride here was interesting but if you already did it at Havelock, you might be disappointed...of course, this was just our experience. The additional snorkelling that can be done is also much better on Elephant beach at Havelock with a more professional approach. Snorkelling off the boats here might take a long time. Also, be prepared to walk about a kilometre to the beach depending on when the tide recedes. For the sheer beauty of a boat ride into the turquoise ocean, nothing can beat the glass-bottomed boat. We did not try any other water sports but jet ski rides and scuba diving are available

title: An active spot on a leisurely island
review_text:
The only spot in Neil where you would find hell lot of people having fun in the crystal clear waters and enjoying the watersports too. Snorkelling(300-500), Glass bottom ride (250/person after disc), Banana Ride (600/person) are some of the tentative charges for reference. Jet ski is mentioned ?500 but they would take you for half the price as two agencies have stiff competition with each other 

Overall nice beach to enjoy watersports. 

Cons: 
1. No luggage storage space. You will have to talk to the watersports guys if you are taking their facilities or some shopwala 

2. Changing/Wash rooms are few and not in a very nice state. 
On the extreme right corner of the beach are eco huts which we came to know only afterwards. On the left theres a pathway which leads to a small guesthouse sorts (which charges you ?800/night if you wish to stay.. he was charging the foreigners staying there about 600 as they were staying for the whole month). This guest house has washroom facility and charges you ?10/person More

title: Extremely clean
location: Salt Lake City, West Bengal, India
review_text: Very nice place.. water sports available..barely 500 meters from jetty... Lots of shops selling pearl items for women.. DON'T BUY FROM PORT BLAIR.. you get same items from this beach stalls at half or even lesser price

title: Good beach near Neil Jetty
review_text:
This beach is very near to Neil jetty and is visible from neil jetty itself. From neil jetty this beach will be slightly less than a kilometer. 

Water is perfect blue and is very clear in this beach.This beach has water-sports . There are many water sports here.We did glass bottom boat ride(special) which costed us Rs 1000 per person and it was good.I think this is the best place to do glass bottom ride while in Andaman as there were many tourists doing glass bottom ride here than other water sports. 

While at neil there are not many food options so we ate at a shack just to the right side of entrance of the beach.We had idly,dosas,tea and Maggi there. Idlys were too good,Dosas were average and Maggi was also very good. Each plate of Idly costed 50 Rs(four idlys in one plate),Each dosa 30 rs,Maggi per plate 50 Rs and tea Rs 20.00. Coconut water was very refreshing and costed Rs 40.00 per coconut. 

If you are coming to this beach by yourself without help of any Tour agents and coming by Auto to this beach then please take the mobile number of Auto driver and give him a call once you want to leave from Bharatpur beach,else you may find it difficult to get Autos from Bharatpur beach back to your hotel/jetty. 

A good beach to be while at Neil. More

title: Glass-bottom boat ride is a must
review_text:
Very close to the jetty. Beautiful white sand beach surrounded by rainforest with 180 degree clear view of colourful ocean. 

Take a glass-bottom boat to go 100-200 meters in the sea and enjoy the stunning marine life under your feets. Probably the most beautiful glass-bottom boat ride in the Andaman. 

There are also other options for water-activities, see the attached photos for their price. 

Beachside shops offer fresh fruits, meals, freshly cooked fish-fries at reasonable price. The beach opens at 5 am, so one can have a morning walk here if staying in a nearby hotel.

title: beach
review_text: plenty of water sports activities available including swimming. clear waters and a glass bottom boat ride will take you above coral reefs and great view. fish formations and underwater rocks.

title: Nice beach near jetty before waiting for the boat
review_text: We as a family enjoyed at this beach. Our boat was at 3 pm. we spent time here did glass boat ride and kids played in the water. Do not go for the glass boat ride if you are planning to visit Jolly Buoy. This beach has all the facilities of changing room washroom. Dint see locker facility but they have the facility to keep the big luggage like suitcase and all at free of cost.. We also had Idly, dosa at this place.. One south Indian Guy was serving it.. It was delicious and of course pocket friendly.. Overall a very good time spent with family..

title: Jet ski
review_text: Bharatpur beach is popular for water sports like jet ski, speed boat, banana boat etc. Its a fun place for everyone.

title: ookay beach
review_text: its a good beach but i dnt preferred for swimming and dnt do scuba over here bcoz the water is not clean over there

title: Awesome Beach to enjoy
location: National Capital Territory of Delhi, India
review_text: Though a bit small in Size ...but this beach is very beautiful to enjoy sea water and water sports. Complete Neil island is a treat to visit and spend a good time.

title: One of the best beaches
review_text:
Fantastic beach. Good jet skiing and Snorkeling. 
Very good and long Lagoon, Water very clear 
Must visit to spend a long time

title: Good beach
review_text: A good beach to be visited to see clear sea water. Not much to be seen n this beach being in Neil Island

title: Breathtaking view and amazing photography location
review_text: This is nearest around 600 meters from Jetty point. One can visit this beach after getting down from Jetty at Neil island. Generally populated with people. This beach offers great photography location.

title: You will love the color of the water
review_text: The only place in Neil where swimming is allowed.Due to white sand, you will see the different colors of water.

title: Bharatpur beach - Neil
review_text:
Bharatpur beach is the one where you have the main Jetty & one of the major attractions of Neil. Neil island is still developing and lacks a lot of infrastructure, restaurants & resorts, however, the blue water, under sea coral & marine life makes it a must see destination. 
You can do scuba, glass boat ride or indulge into various water sports activities. 

Once you are through with the activities, you can sit back, relax & enjoy some refreshing coconut waters. 

Some prices: 
Coconut - INR 40 
Tea - INR 20 
Maggi - INR 70 

Rides: 
Glass boat - Special full boat INR 1000 
Water scooter - INR 300

title: Hours of fun!
review_text: This beach is near the Neil Jetty. It is a great place for all water sports and scuba. The water is very clear and shallow for quite a distance so it is quite safe. We played in the water for hours here. Do make sure to put on sunscreen as the sun is quite strong in these parts.

title: Awesome place
review_text: Clean place .. only place in island with water sports. It was a pleasent place. Water sports here are Cheap than elephang beach at havelock Island

title: Water activities
review_text: In Neil island all sorts of water activities are done here . Glass bott ride is must if u are not doing scuba diving. Wonderful corals fishes can be seen through glass bott ride. Always busy beach. I did jet ski and was enthrilled. You can bath here as changing rooms are also there. Neil island is a very peaceful small village type are and local people are honest. Only problem is network connectivity.

title: Colourful and crowded
review_text:
Best beach to do water activities in Neil island. Very near to jetty. 

Low rides scenes were bit funny. 
We went for a glass bottom ride when we went for ride it was high tide and by the time we were back it looked like sea moved back. 

Overall must visit place in Neil and do visit natural bridge. It's different than all beaches and you can see live corals as well.

title: One of the best Beach of Neil
review_text: Yes, The Bharatpur Beach is the Best Beach of Neil, Very Flat and white sand, and also lots of people on the beach. Do not fear to go deep inside. Love this Beach.

title: Good place for water activities
review_text: If its low tide, it will be difficult to reach the sea so try to plan your activities for high tide. Listen to the locals, they know and are very helpful.

title: Nice beach for glass boat ride and other rides
review_text: really nice beach for swimming and rides..glass boat ride is must try to discover underwater world which takes half an hour..changing rooms are also available if going for swimming

title: Beautiful Beach to have maximum fun
review_text:
I had visited Neil Island in Sep 2017. 
This is best beach in Neil & Havelock. RadhaNagar Beach is over rated & crowded. This beach is excellent where you can spend quality time is watching the beauty, paying with kids as well exploring corals. These corals are much much better than light house coral in Havelock. 

I had planned just 1 day stay in Neil & 4 days in Havelock .... & i regretted for that. Neil need at-least 2 days ..if you really want to enjoy its beauty. For facebook community ..may be 1 day will be more ..

title: Another touristy beach
review_text: A stone throws distance from the main jetty this relatively small beach boasts of numerous water activities most popular being glass bottom boat rides. You are free to swim in the water which is quite shallow for some distance.

title: Beautiful beach with pristine water
review_text: We visited this beach during the day and spent about 4 hours. It was great, it wasn't too crowded and the water is so clear you can see few corals as well. There are couple of souvenir shops on the beach as well with snack stalls, try the maggi if you are hungry. It's better to skip the small restaurants on the beach. It's quite windy and there is plenty of natural shade due to the trees.

title: Water Sports and chill :)
review_text:
this beach has numerous shops to scuba dive, glass bottom boat tours, snorkelling, jet ski and all the activites have nominal rate. 
We did scuba dive and it was an ethereal experience. There is lot of shades on the beach even during hot summer days. Ideal for picnic and water sports.

title: Happening beach with activities
review_text: This beach is quite busy with lot of events and activities. Activities that include Jetski, Glass boat, snorkeling & Scuba are commonly seen activities.

title: excellent
review_text: this is one of the beautiful beach in neil island.water is clear and greenish.so many shops on the beach side.dress changing rooms also there.

title: BEACH OF WATER SPORTS ACTIVITY
review_text: You can take a bath here. Two fresh water bathrooms (one Govt and another Pvt.). Water sports activity except water scooter depends upon SEA WIND.

title: Very beautiful beach
review_text: Very near to Neil jetty. Beautiful beach, clear waters. Many stalls selling shell items, shell jewelleries etc. Glass bottom ride was available here.

title: Nice beach for sport acitivities
review_text: Wonderful place to do the water activities specially glass bottom ride and the jet ski. Good facilities like changing room. Neat and clean beach

title: Wonderful place for water activities
review_text: Had a wonderful time here. Did JetSki, glass boat ride. Morning there was high tide and by noon due to low tide, the water went back and we could walk a little inside the beach on sand. Lovely place.

title: famous for the water activities
review_text: more famous for water activities.. but if you just want to sit there and enjoy the breeze, that too is great. the beach recedes during the daytime due to low tide, so better to go early morning or late afternoon, for better sea views.

title: Very beach for all the water activities!!!!!
review_text:
This beach is very near to the Neil Island jetty, Must visit place. 
It has number of water activities like water bike, Glass bottom boat for seeing different different corals and most importantly scuba diving. Don't miss this beach when visiting A&N Islands.

title: Perfect beach for Water Sports activities
review_text:
It is one of cleanest beach in the Andaman. Beach is neat and clean and water is transparent enough for Glass Bottom Boat. 
Other water sports facilities such as jet ski and banana ride can also be availed.

title: best beach in andaman because of visibility
review_text: scuba diving,snorkeling ,glass boat visibility is excellent.diff colors of water and visibility make this beach top rated.Small waves and clean water like big swimming pool.secure beach

title: Good looking
review_text: Beach is specially for water sports like scuba.. snorkelling.. glassbottom... jet ski.. fishing... the water is.crystal clear therefore this is the best for underwater. But i suggest assured about safty and security first. You can bath here but no sea wave. Coral harm your legs. There are paid and free changing rooms are available.

title: Nice & wide
review_text: According to me It is the best beach of Neil after Laxmanpur beach and very close to the jetty. Very wide and comparatively crowded. All types of event like water scooter [Rs 450 per ride], bottom glass coral view etc available. But if you have for planned for Jollybouy, here bottom glass ride can be avoided because in compare to Jollybouy the presence of coral & fishes are very very less. Rate of bottom glass is Rs 500 per head. Have coconut water and different food items, so many shops there. You can have bat ride & take bath there. Overall very nice for time passing. For those staying in Hawabill nest [the tourism hotel], it is only 300/400 m away. More

title: Best sunset point
review_text: Excellent view, quaint ,serene, the best that possibly can be,must visit for sunset , want to go back there back, have maggi and coconut water, sit back, relax, let the time unfold and see the magic yourself

title: Glass bottom boat ride in Bharatpur beach
review_text: One can go for glass bottom boat ride in this beach to see live corals & fishes through the bottom of the boat but photography is not so good due to reflection of water. It's alternative option for those who can't go for snorkeling or scuba diving to see the corals. Scooter rides & scuba diving are also available here. One can buy small gift items from small shops owned by local Bengali people.Always keep change clothes, towel etc in a bag.

title: Very beautiful and picturesque beach
review_text: Went their on 30th Nov'17. It is a very beautiful and picturesque beach. The time I went, that is from around 12:00 PM to 2:30 PM), all the sport activities except were inactive except for Jet Ski. Point to be careful about is that beach is very rocky.

title: Best beach of Neil island and one of the best in Andaman
review_text: Good stretch of white sand beach, clear green water, lots of activities and water sports, changing area, restaurants, shops. Overall this is the most busy and happening area of Neil island

title: Best beach
review_text: Ideal for swimming with children. No strong tides, not deep water, but clean water. Best place to spend your time with family. You can do scuba diving, snorkeling, speed boat ride, glass bottom boat ride,etc. I liked the most in my entire Andaman trip.

title: It’s a good place for swimming and jet skiing!
review_text: It’s a beautiful beach,good for water activities and also for a swim,way less crowded than havelock beaches .

title: Good water sports
review_text:
This place is great for water sports. We took a glass bottom boat and were lucky to have a good sun to see the coral bed and fishes. Once in the sea, my son did snorkeling. 

We had lunch at a restaurant nearby. Good fried fish and curry rice.

title: Best beach to perform glass boat ride
review_text: Bharatpur beach is the best beaches in neil island to perform glass boat ride which gives better and good view of corals inside the turquoise color water. To far extend you will be able to enjoy the scenic beauty and would wish to just sit and relax on the shore. Must visit place for couples and group of people.

title: we had fun and shop
review_text: once again a nature gift to us. beautiful water color , rich sea life and lots of activities , scuba,snorkelling,glass bottom boat

title: Good place for snorkeling
review_text: This place gives a unique experience of snorkeling in the middle of the sea. They charge only 500 RS and it is a unique experience.other activities such as glass bottom ride and scuba can be availed

title: A beach which offers water activities.
review_text: At low tide you can walk out about 500 m. There are some shacks at the landing point and one can get tea and snacks as well as trinkets. If you want to use the glass bottom boat then you need to go when the tide is in

title: Beautiful Beach
review_text: One of the nice beach. Glass Boat available to view live Corals n different Fishes under the Sea. Most pleasant.

title: Shopping!
review_text: The Bharatpur beach is small beach close the jetty offers many tiny shops to buy pearls, stones and hotels, changing room. Only place in Neil to get into water and offers water sports jet skiing.

title: Perfect for swim and water sport
review_text:
Perfect swimming beach with safety gaurd around and rope in sea for safety . 

Lots of food options like pagoda, maggi, bhel around 

Changing room and shower facility present for free. 

Near to jetty ...just 1km 

Near to market and ATM....10 minute by walk

title: Second best beach
review_text: This was clean and clear beach with good water sport options. You would rather be better off at other beaches for water sports but the cleanliness on this beach was really nice.

title: Best beach to view corals and marine life
review_text: We had glass bottom boat ride, snorkeling and scuba diving done here. One can see parrot fish, lemon fish, zebra fish, sardines, different coral forms esp. blue corals and clams here. Very clear emerald green water.

title: Crystal clear water..

review_text: To reach this beach, you need to buy a ticket for a cruise from the Phoenix bay jetty ticket counter. title: Water sports/activity center of Neil with beautiful Coral Reefs
review_text:
The beach you see from Neil Jetty is Bharatpur beach. A must visit. 
You can spend quite a good time till afternoon/evening. Lonely beach in morning and evening with soothing breeze. But real fun starts @ 10:00 AM once sport activities start. 

Activities depend on water level so may delay by an hour and continue till 2:00 PM (max by 3 PM). 

You can enjoy Jet ski (good) , Glass bottom boat (best in Andaman), snorkeling (good) , scuba (try Scuba India explorers / Dive India ) expensive but good. Else do it in Havlock. Don't book dive with govt Ticket counter people they are economic but is not proper scuba. 

After 2 PM sea level start decreasing and you can go deep in the sea and relax / swim and have fun. Super clean water. 

Even in afternoon you may not feel hot as breeze and ample tree shades are available. 

Please Note : Do Carry swim clothes / extra clothes 
Changing rooms are available (both paid/free) 
Many Maggi stalls till 4 PM 
1 or 2 small restaurants are there but food is available till 2 PM only 
(veg thali Rs 150/-) . food was okish. 
Few shopping stalls were also there beside ticket counter. More

The beach is clean with crystal clear blue waters, long stretches of sand- and one can relax, play and take bathe. The washrooms/ changing rooms are OK - there are some shops to get snacks, juice, etc. We all enjoyed the time at Bharatpur beach. More

title: Awesome place...Most liked by my family !!!
review_text:
I'd rate this as number 1 at Neil...because my family liked it the most (wife and 4 yr son).. 

Just next to the Neil Island Jetty...Visit during low tide (9-9:30 AM) and spend 4-5 Hrs easily...This beach can keep you busy for 3-4 Hours... So plan accordingly and do not book return ticket to Port Blair/Havelock on 11:00 AM cruise.... 

During low tide you can literally walk barefoot 500 m into the sea and the water level wont come above your knee or above hip of your kid ... crystal clear water...clear blue at the horizon....soft sand below....calm with mild waves....you won't believe unless you visit this place.... 

the beach has a changing and wash room facility at the entrance...small eatery shops...length of trees overlooking the shore all along the beach....glass boat ride activity (if you have done any of Scuba/Snorkel/Sea Walk...glass boat ride is worthless).... 

A must visit place...Check out the pictures More

title: This beach is a bliss!
review_text:
This beach is a heaven for the people looking for some water sports.. You can go for a snorkeling excursion. In addition, there are glass boats available for the people who are less interested in the snorkeling and water sports. 
This beach is more commercialized in comparison to the other beaches in Neils and also a bit less pristine than the other. But this really doesn't kill the beauty. The clear blue water will leave you spellbound. 

The water is shallow near the beach and it is a perfect spot for families (elders and kids also) to play and spend some good time in water. 
The things that I liked the most about this beach is that refreshments and changing rooms are available on the beach ?itself. So it is quite tourist friendly.. In addition, you could also shop for souvenirs on the beach. 
It took me a full day to explore the beach and the activities. So i would suggest to keep aside a complete day if you are laid-back and want to relax. 

In the end, I would recommend you to reach here in the early half of the day because of the low tide (in after noon ) the water recedes and that could be a real spoiler. More

title: Come, sit, lie, float, meditate, walk, admire the sunset
review_text: I spent an entire day at this particular beach. As you enter, it might look crowded, take a walk down the beach to find solitude if you wish. The calmest waters i have seen allows one to just lie on the water and keep floating for as long as he/she wishes. Get a snorkeling kit and admire the shallow tiny corals colonies. Some 200 meters from the beach, on the way to the market, is a restaurant called "Durga" serving delicious Bengali style fish curry for when you're craving. Walk further down and find a sweet spot to admire the sunset. Keep an eye down because the beach is a highway for most beautiful shell fishes you will see. You don't walk on sand, but corals on this beach. One of the best beaches I've spent some time on. Make sure you carry some mosquito repellent for use after the sunset. More

title: Horrible
review_text:
The water is so beautiful, but the massive crowd of boats docked right in front of the beach ruins it. Trash is lying alllll around the beach. Usually packed with people. 
The worst water sports organizers I've ever seen in my life. 0/100 for service. These lazy, unfriendly, pathetic men run the only water sports shop on the island. 
Not credible at all. They made me wait 50mins for snorkeling, and then I was told to leave because "the guide simply isn't going to come". To me it seems horrible to swim next to parked boats. Can't peacefully lie down and relax on the beach either, don't think there's enough space for that. One of my worst experiences on the Andaman islands. More

title: Sit back n relax
review_text: Firstly the color of d water s jus breathtaking..we Sat der n witnessed d whole low tide high tide phenomena..it was surreal..we walked towards interior of d sea wen it was low tide n that exp was somethin to cherish

title: Peaceful place splanked with options to enjoy Sea sports
review_text: This beach is closest to the jetty and has many options that let you explore the beautiful corals and marine life. You could dive, snorkel, take a glass boat or simply chill on beach side ! Complete package with a heavenly ocean view.

title: Stunning beach
review_text: Bharatpur beach, at Neil island is by far one of the most beautiful beach I have seen. Quite calm, crystal clear and so clean. Also good one for sports activities.

title: Beach with watersports
review_text: Bharatpur beach provides lot of watersport activities and perhaps the only one where you can swim. No hotels nearby which means almost all neil island tourists would come here. If the weather is clear and sunny, go for a glass bottom boat ride. I have done this in other countries including USA but can say this beats all of them. It's like watching Discovery channel live. amazing of the reefs, corals and fish. Do Not miss this if the weather is sunny and bright.

title: Average beach
review_text: Usually tourists r dumped with their luggage here bcs in entire andaman hotel checkout time is 8 am (god knows why). Here there r glass bottom n other rides, but skip if u r visiting havelock or jolly buoy or north bay

title: Water Sports
review_text: The only place in Neil Island where water sports are being conducted. Its a good place for spending lazy afternoon. The good thing is that the prices of water sports are fixed so that there is no trouble of haggling for prices are the feeling of being cheated.

title: Sunrise beach of Neil Island
review_text:
We reached this beach at noon. There was no sunrise phenomenon to be viewed that time but this place had those qualities that make you want to stay there forever. So calm, so serene and so beautiful. 
White sand, clear water, shades of blue - nothing short of a magical place. 
Take a book along, water, shades and a mat - you are good to spend some quality time with yourself.

title: Best for Water Sports
review_text: This beach is best for water sports in Neil. Awesome place for JetSki, Coral visit in Boat. Me and My family enjoyed our visit here and nice place to spend for all relaxing and sports

title: Must visit place in Neil
review_text: If you want to see corals, then this is the best place. Take a glass bottom ride and you will see a lot more corals in very clean water than havelock or port blair. There are some other water sport activities also, not many though.

title: Supero Super
review_text: one of the triplet beaches in Neil Island and better than the other two.so natural and clean.good for recreation.

title: Excellent, Excellent & Excellent.
review_text: Nothing to say more than Excellent about Bharatpur beach. We went there on 19th October 2016. It is the best beach in Neil Island.

title: Excellent beach
review_text: Safe, clean, reachable beach, also good for children. Has water sport facility here. Can shop good articles here. I found it much better than Radha nagar beach of Havelock.

title: Enjoying watching the corals
review_text: This beach is better known for its coral reef. We hired a glass bottom boat here and the boat man took us to places where coral was in abundance. It was a wonderful sight watching the corals along with several colorful fishes. This is well maintained, neat and clean beach.

title: Best Beach In entire Andamans
review_text: Turquoise Blue waters, white sand, colourful corals, clear visibility upto deep waters - this beach is absolute bliss and was my best experience at Andamans. The water is so crystal clear that you will be able to watch fishes roaming around even in knee length water levels. Activities include - Glass Bottom boat ride (non AC), snorkelling, Jet Ski and of course you are free to bathe in the sea. A must go place. Do not miss this one!

title: Very Nice
review_text: Lot of water based activities from this place till 2 pm, scuba dive snorking, boat rides available,glass bottom boat

title: Good for walks, not for swimming
review_text: This is a very rocky beach, which is excellent for walks, but definitely not for swimming. Lovely view of the sea, in different shades of blue. Sunset was simply beautiful.

title: Mesmerizing blue water
review_text: This beach is located just next to neil island jetty and the mesmerising clear blue water welcomes you as soon as you reach Neil island. We did snorkelling and glass bottom ride here and saw a variety of beautiful corals and fish. The sea is shallow for a long stretch and the waves are gentle. It was the highlight of our Neil island trip.

title: Sport activity
review_text: Good beach having sports activity facility but I saw no life saving boat here.quite environment.you may also see coral .it just near from jetty.

title: See your shadow!
review_text: One of the best beaches in the islands. On a good sunny afternoon, you can see your shadow in the knee deep ocean. That's how clear blue waters it is. Fantastic experience!

title: Excellent Beach - Probably best in Neil Island
review_text: This beach is for ideal for taking bath, glass bottom boat ride in Neil island. Snorkelling is also possible here. The good thing for this beach is that the sea is very calm here and you can go up to 2 kms inside the sea while you can still see your leg visible inside water (the water is so clear here!!). So must visit and take bath here. This beach is just beside the jetty only.

title: Best Beach in Neil Island
review_text:
Bharatpur is the Best Beach in Neil Island. It is good for swimming. Activities like glass bottom boat rides, snorkelling are available here. There are several stall selling local artifacts etc. There is a restaurant (AND Restaurant) close to the beach and the owner approaches people on the beach to take them to the restaurant. I had a very bad experience with this restaurant. Don't fall into theis trap. 
The beach is shallow and very safe for swimming for all.

title: Nice place in the morning!
review_text: It is a beautiful beach where you can spend morning hours. One can enjoy the Glass bottom boat ride here.

title: Neil is a must visit place
review_text: The water is absolutely green. They offer a variety of activities. Police help desk is there and lifeguard too. Great for seeing corals. The beach is very clean. In fact the locals are extra conscious to keep it clean. The shops offer good rates for any item than Port Blair.

title: Nice place for some water sports
review_text: we enjoyed glass bottom boat ride there. there are a lot of local shops on this beach. they also offer different types of boat rides.

title: Highly recommended for Swimming & playing
review_text:
This beach located just beside the jetty. It is good for water sport activities. 
alternatively, you can walk further along the beach for a more isolated view of the beach..

title: Best of all 3 beaches in Neil, but still not as good as Havelock
review_text:
Best of all 3 beaches in Neil, but still not as good as Havelock. If u happen to visit Neil, plan a visit here. Actually when u land at Neil jetty the beach corals u get to see is that of Bharatpur. The other 2 beaches are on the opposite side of the island. 
People here force u to take deep sea dives and glass boating for coral view. Avoid spending the money here and keep it aside for North Bay/ Havelock/ Jolly Boy. They only give a 10 min drive at RFs 500 during peak season till the place which u can see in naked eye from the Neil jetty. The water being very clear corals are even visible from the jetty. 
Some small food stalls are available with very limited items. No beach side restros as such. Plan to carry food or have it from Neil jetty side restros where they serve octopus, shrimps, basa and tuna fishes. More

title: Lush green...
review_text: Another beauty of the Andamans, this one is conveniently located close to the Neill island jetty. Superb lush green view of the water and white sands made it a perfect morning stroll for us.

title: Gosh This is is a must to visit
review_text: Boss this place is not to miss, from Sea Shore till 500 meters towards sea water is just at knee level where fishes going besides you. Please visit this place you love the this place

title: Nice activity beach
review_text: This beach located just beside the jetty. It is good for activities. You can go for glass-bottomed boat for seeing sea corals and fish. Speed boat. You can go for snorkeling and they are preparing for scuba diving. You can find banana ride and jetski driving.

title: Sunset point of Neil Island
review_text: This is basically the sunset point for Tourists visiting Neil Island. Watching the Sun Set amidst White Sand and Blue water is mesmerizing. Its worth a visit.

title: Get an insight into the marine world
review_text: Apart from the beaches in and around Port Blair city, the most visited beaches distant from Port Blair are Radhanagar Beach in Havelock Island and Bharatpur Beach in Neil Island. The main attraction in Bharatpur Beach is the wonderful marine life. The variety of marine life here is great. Ride on a glass bottom boat here helps one get an insight into the marine world composed of corals, colorful fishes, snails and aquatic plants. It's a very spectacular sight.

title: The best beach of Andamans
review_text: Its undoubtedly the best beach of Andamans.. underrated.. the water is crystal clear.. can sea turtles swimming.. can go for jet ski ride.. speed boat rides.. glass bottom boats.. super fun...

title: Only beach for bathing in Neil
review_text: While the other beaches are dangerous & rocky, this is a considerably calm and safe beach for bathing & swimming. The water is crystal clear.

title: Rich in Marine Life
review_text: This beach is very rich in aquatic life. Great variety of corals and fishes are present in the waters around the beach. We hired a Glass Bottom Boat here to watch the corals. The sight of the entire marine ecosystem involving the Corals, colourful fishes, molluscs etc. was very appealing to the eye

title: Amazing beach
review_text: A lovely experience on the beach and its beauty. A very scenic view and a pleasurable experience. Relaxing,calm and pleasant.

title: Water sports, shoping & more at Neil island
review_text:
Need at least half a day. Water sports are charged little more but is less crowded. Only one food joint is available little away from beach. Activities operate onlyy if sea is not rough. August is ideal as it is not peak season but climate is good. We dod not face rain during 6 day stay. You must club natural beach having corals & sea cucumber which is just 10 minutes drive. 

Winderful experience.

title: Awesome corals
review_text: This beach offers a few water activities, snorkeling being one of them, which should be done here instead of elephant island.. The corals here are much more beautiful than in elephant island. Even scuba can be tried but it is more expensive than in havelock. But if you are here for love of corals, u must go for it. we even saw different species of fishes here.

title: One of the Best Beach in India
review_text: We visited this beach in July. Color of the water is sea green. we can see under water objects very clearly. We did glass bottom boat ride and it is very nice. This beach is ideal for bathing.

title: Perfect place to view Sea resting at peace
review_text:
Bharatpur beach is a perfect location for those who love spending day long and night on beaches watching resting sea and very silent... 

Must visit place as part of andmans...

title: Great beach
review_text: The beach is near the market area. Beach also offers some sports activities also. Some local shops also there. The water is blue and clear. A must visit during Neil stay.

title: Coral Reef Watcher's Paradise
review_text: Bharatpur Beach is located on the Neil Island. The beach is close to the Neil island jetty, about half a kilometre away. This place is a paradise for the coral watchers. There are extensive coral reef around the beach. They can be watched by hiring a glass bottom boat. The boat man will take your around the spots rich in coral reef and you could watch the coral along with beautiful color fishes and other marine creatures. This beach is good place for scuba diving and snorkeling. There is low tide in the waters and hence, it's an ideal place for swimming too.

title: Wow beautiful beach with clear water
review_text: this beach was amazing with lot of water activities like jet ski, glass boat, snorkeling and scuba. There are small shops which sells souvenirs at reasonable price compared to havelock and port blair. there are no waves in this beach(due to its set back) so its safe for swimming. Do allocate appropriate time to enjoy this beauty.

title: Beach for adventure activities
review_text: Half a kilometer from the jetty, Bharatpur is one of the best beaches known for swimming and coral-watching with a vast sandy stretch. You can hire glass-bottom boats for coral viewing. The sea around the Jetty area is full of corals with fish swimming around. The colour and form of vegetation along the beach soothes the senses.

title: Beautiful Beach
review_text: Guys its an amazing beach near to Neil Jetty & hosts water activities like glass bottom boat to view corals. A clean, silent, serene & scenic beach.

title: nice beach and good for swimming
review_text: nice beach and not much tides. good for water sports activities and we did snorkling and motor boat. it has scenic beauty

title: Morning looks superb.. Evening drained .. Water sports nice
review_text: This is very close to jetty .. just u can walk through hardly 100 feets shore distance .. Water scooter, boating, coral..etc are nice .. Some shops also there .. Bath room speciality is good .. you can see coral pieces on the shore side .. Morning looks very pleasant. . Evening drained .. I just astonished but people are saying it happens more often ..

title: Good for watching marine life
review_text:
Bharatpur beach ,one of the best destination you will find in Neil island.This beach is ideal for water activity and to see rich marine life. Here you can do glass bottom boat 
riding and scuba diving. The beach is filled with natural vegetation and its scenic beauty.

title: Nice Beach near the Jetty
review_text: This is the first beach you will visit if in a tour. It next to the Jetty. There are water sports available here, but wouldn't recommend taking the glass bottom ride at this place as the corals and fish spots aren't much around here. Its better at Jolly Buoy Island

title: Bharatpur beach
review_text:
This beach is famous for corals and the ornamental fishes. 
we hired a glass boat here.The boat will take you to the points where coral reefs are present,you find schools of colorful fishes. 

Shops on the beach sell souvenirs little cheaper than most of other places in Andaman's 
Tender coconuts here were nice.

title: close to jetty with pearl white sand
review_text: Bharatpur beach is right at the Neil island jetty (about half a kilometer) and is wide, white beach. Most of the tourists visit this beach in the morning hours and do snorkeling as in the evening they get to watch the sunset at Laxmanpur beach.

title: Awesome place to visit
review_text: Beautiful beach. If you go on to the beach, go to the left side and walk all the way to where the rocksbegin. It is far more quiet and less crowded. When the tide is low, you can see beautiful corals and fishes over there.

title: amazing place
review_text: Beautiful beach. If you go on to the beach, go to the left side and walk all the way to where the rocksbegin. It is far more quiet and less crouwded. When the tide is low, you can see beautiful corals and fishes over there.

title: clean and blue water good place for snorkeling
review_text: very clean beach, good for snorkeling after that u can take bath in paid bathrooms at very reasonable rate....

title: visited it only once
review_text: Good beach, just a bit far from where I stay and I can't be bothered to walk, cycle or hire a taxi to take me there !

title: Welcome Beach Of Neil
review_text:
This beach is right behind the jetty of Neil. 
Actually jetty is constructed on this beach only. 
You take an auto to this beach. 
Its a 2-3 min drive from jetty. 
This beach is famous for corals and transparent spots in sea to watch the ornamental fishes. 
we hired a glass boat for 1 hr. 
The boat will take u to the coral point where the colorful fishes can be viewed. 
Shops of sea and forest products on the shore. 
Fruit juices and tender coconut shops too. 
You can have a nice view of ships entering leaving the jetty. 
You can spend max of 1 hr at this beach.

title: Bharatpur Beach
review_text: This beach is great for enjoyment in Sea water it is safe & you can take sea bath, glass boating, jet-sky ride, snorkeling and many more activities are there, a must stay here atleast one light here instead at Havelock Island........ overall it is great one in Andaman tour

title: One of the best beach in Andaman
review_text: This is an unique combination of blue water and lush green forest. The place is very close to the Neil jetty. The beach is famous for glass bottom boat trip where you can see the corals , different kinds of fishes under the water. The beach is flat as such you can walk long into the sea

title: Biggest beach in Neil
review_text: Definite visit if you are in Neil island. This beach also has water activities including scuba(though more expensive than havelock)

title: only beach in Neil worth a visit
review_text:
Neil island has three beaches of which only this one offers watersports and glass bottom boat rides. the coral reef sets and shoal of large number of fish near the reef are unique. we could even see a giant turtle lazing around near the coral. 

the charges for various rides are slightly on the plus side and could have been lesser. only plus point is that there are no hidden charges. 

food options are limited but since your timing is related to the departure of ferry from adjacent jetty you tend to manage.

title: Good for sports activities
review_text: At Neil Island, only Bharatpur beach offers sports activities. Andaman offers many beautiful beaches. And if you compare you may not find bharatpur beach upto mark. But it is clean and there are not many options in Neil so you should give it a visit.

title: Good place and average beach of Andaman Trip but good of Neil Island. Should visit of-coarse if in Neil.
review_text: Though Beach was beautiful but its the Average of Andaman & Nicobar. Many local shops there selling stuff but I also heard, stuff without bill can be stopped at airport so please check for bills always while shopping.

title: Paradise
review_text: One of the most exotic beaches, I have ever seen. One can enjoy the sight of a unique sky blue color of the water. Needless to say, swimming is fun in this thinly crowded beach.

title: For shopping and water sports activities
review_text: Bharatpur beach is for sports activities, not as good as that at Elephant beach. But Glassbottom boat ride is better here.

title: An average beach in Andaman
review_text: Nothing much to write about this beach.. During low tide..the water recedes a long way back and to reach waterfront is a long walk. The activities are much more expensive (read double) than Havelock so better to avoid.

title: Clean beautiful beach on Neil Island
review_text:
This is another beach which is clean and beautiful. Morning when we went around 10 AM the tide was very low and we could not enjoy to swim or play in the sea. I am not sure what time the beach close but our agent said it gets closed by 3:00 PM. All the activities available here are same as on Elephant beach on Havelock and we did everything there except the glass bottom ride which we did on Jolly Buoy Island. There is nothing new to offer if you have already done the Havelock island and specially Elephant beach there. 
The beach has changing rooms and shower available. There are some small shops around beach as well which are a good time pass. 
I feel this beach is very peaceful and relaxing and one can spend some time in the lap of nature. More

title: The place for water activities in Neil Island
review_text: This is the beach that you see to your left once you reach neil island jetty. This place has the smaller glass bottom boats which is a good option if you don't want to get wet but want to peek into the water. The bigger glass bottom boat wont be available here. One can do snorkelling as well here. Or probably watch other do it. Some shops selling trinkets but nothing interesting.

title: Best Beach in Neil Island
review_text:
This beach is the best beach in Neil Island. Good for bathing also but the water level goes down after 1 PM. 

We did glas bottom ride (Exclusive for couple - Rs 800) and we enjoyed the life under the water. The colour of the water was deep blue and had a awesome view.

title: clean green water
review_text:
all green water and corals everywhere 
Nice to take glass bottom boat and go for coral view .Also scuba jetski and other sports activity 
Great for shopping sovereigns and local handmade stuff

title: Our visit to Bharatpur beach Neil Island
review_text: A very serene and beautiful beach ideal for water sports . We did a special glass bottom boat and saw the beautiful corals and shoals of fish in the crystal clear waters,

title: Place for beach activities at Niel
review_text: Niel has some of the best coral reefs. Far better than what Havelock can offer. This beach is best for scuba diving and snorkeling. The waters are too clear to imagine.

title: Great beach but check tide timings before visiting
review_text: this beach is best visited when its a high tide as the water is very clear and high tide will have more water by the shore

title: Snorkeling
review_text: Nice place to do snorkeling. It would be better to go when there is low tide. Aquatic life will be greatly visible.

title: Great experience..
review_text:
The beach is near jetty. We have visited this early morning. U can have snorkeling, glass boat ride etc.. 
The corals near the jetty are almost died. But wen u go some far.. In deeper sea.. U will see variety of species. Take a long glass boat ride to explore more. 
There are a lot of local vendors.. You can have lot of shopping for pearl and coral items are cheaper rates. I just loved that.

title: clear light sea green water, great for swimming during low tide when water recedes quite further inside
review_text:
It is very near to the jetty, the beach also has some shacks for quick snacks. 
Mega restaurant which is less than 500 meters away from the beach at the entrance serves amazing home cooked Bengali food prepared by Ms Sadhana, highly recommended for sea food..

title: A nice beach having water rides.
review_text: This is a very scenic beach, some water rides are also there if you want to enjoy. A glass boat ride is also offered if you wish to watch corals. Good for a long quiet walk on the beach. A must go beach.

title: Beach for activities
review_text:
Lots of rides, like glass bottom boat, water speed boat, water scooter for adventure lover. 
Sand is full of broken shale pcs. 
Avoid high tide / rough weather if any ride is desired.

title: LIttle rocky beach with good sunset point
review_text: visited with family and were not fortunate to get a good glimpse of Sunset due to weather condition. Nevertheless, a good place to be in with lovely water and peaceful place. A must visit.

title: One of the best beaches..
review_text: I love the place special Andaman.. Nice beach to swim n relax crystal clear water with snorkeling.. Sea fish the beautiful corals.... V feel happy visting the place

title: Not a good place to couple
review_text:
We stayed in this island for 2 nights 

We been to this place in jan 22. Here over hyped for this place. 

Not to swim here.. 

Glass bottom boat ride is not excited as your taking scuba dive. It vl be useful for children.

title: Worth visiting
review_text: Very clean beach and great place to view the beauty of the sea. The Glass Bottom boat ride I feel is the best. For sea food lovers (nothing exotic but nice local stuffs) try out the local joints and they cook fresh meals and reasonably priced.

title: Very clean
review_text: The place has beautiful sunset and is amazingly clean. Must go around 4.30 pm. It is also nice for water sports activities but during day time.

title: Don't Miss Glass Bottom Boat ride.........
review_text: Good Beach. Snorkeling is better here, don't try scuba diving here. scuba diving is better at elephant beach havelock

title: Place for activity in Neil Island
review_text: This beach is beautiful. Also, most of the activities like snorkelling , glass bottom boat ride and snorkelling is done rom this beach.

title: Good to view and glass bottom ride
review_text: Bharatpur beach is near to the neil island jetty port and the beach is not clean its is just gud for viewing and enjoying the corals reef from glass bottom ride and also good for tge enjoying purpose

title: Descent water sports activities
review_text: Bharatpur Beach has descent water sport activities. We enjoyed snorkelling there as there were quiet a few corals near to the shore. We saw corals buy going in just knee deep water. One more rare activity there is glass bottom boat. Its good for people who would like to enjoy the under water beauty without getting wet. Scuba diving is much better at havelock with better instructors , equipments. Avoid scuba diving here.

title: Muahhh
review_text: One of the best beaches. Loved it. Enjoyed swimming here. You do snorkelling as well. You just don't wanna take you eyes off this beautiful view. Check the photo.

title: beautiful!
review_text: the waters are very pure and crystal clear, sands white and soft. the water sport guys offer glass boat ride and snorkelling. we opted for snorkelling. to our surprise they took us inside the sea in glass bottomed boat. so we got a two rides for the price of one ;) i strongly recommend to do snorkelling rather than being boated around.

title: Excellent Place, Like Radhanagar Beach of Neli Island
review_text: This is the best place of the Neil Island, Clarity of water and color are awesome. View is excellent and bathing is excellent. Take at least one day for this place. Take visit as per high tide time.

title: Glass Boat Ride!
review_text:
It is a small beach with limited water sports activities. We took a glass boat ride and it was really good. They take you into deep sea on a boat which has magnifying glass as boat floor. 
Because of which you can see all the beautiful corals and colorful fishes when they take you for a round. 
Must give it a try. 

Caution: One might get sea sick with all motion.

title: Wonderful beach
review_text: Wonderful beach for water activities, boating and bathing. You can move far inside the sea just walking to get a great view

title: Cool beach
review_text: Clean beach with loads of water sports activities available. Loads of trees with shade around it make it a very pleasant experience. The sea water is absolutely clean and beautiful. A no of small vendors give a variety of local sea products. All in all a safe and enjoyable place.

title: nice flat beach
review_text:
very nice beach no rocks. only rock free beach in Neil island. 

good for glass boats to see corals. quite crowded with tourists

title: Beach for adventure activities
review_text: One can enjoy all adventure activities here. But beach is bit too much commercialized, it is also a bit dirty, not a good place for nature lovers. I only did Jet Ski, which was only a 10-15 minutes activity as beaches here are rocky, so they don’t allow doing Jet Ski alone. A person will take control of Jet Ski which was the reason my wife didn’t go for it. It is a good place for shopping lovers; one can buy hats, t-shirts, shells and other mementos. My wife bought a hat for her and a t-shirt for me

title: A beautiful beach with blue sea and white sand
location: National Capital Territory of Delhi, India
review_text: Bharatpur Beach at Neil Island is one of the popular beaches in the region of Andaman and Nicobar Island. This beach is very famous place for activities like coral watching by glass boat and swimming and an apt destination to enjoy the vacations with family. An excellent experience.

title: A big and clean beach for water activites
review_text: This is a neat & clean beach where all water sports are available and proper arrangement for water activities exists. Scuba diving, Glass-top water diving and other sports are available there and the young visitors enjoy all these activities. Even rescue teams of the Government agencies are also available for any exigencies etc.

title: Very Beautiful Clear Sea Beach.
review_text: Clean and Clear.... Beautiful color of Sea. Dont miss underwater Bottom Boat ride in this place. Rides are very cheapest capared to other island.

title: Best beach on the island
review_text: Since the checkout is at 8am on this island and the ferry was at 11.00 we were forced to spend 3 hours here and realised what a wonderful place it is.

title: Rough waters!
review_text: Extremely rough waters, ideal for water sports. Personally I prefer quiet beaches. This one took me by surprise by its sheer pressure of the waves. Not ideal for children below 8 years.

title: Calm n serene
review_text: The first beach we went after checking in at the Hawa Bill Nest govt rest house, Bharatpur beach is a beautiful n well managed beach destination where most of the aspects of activities and requirements are well looked after. The tour operators were courteous n doesn't jump d gun. One can find activities ranging from Scuba diving, glass bottom boat rides, speed boats n jetskies. Or one can just relax in the beach. The best part is lots of trees just in the beach giving relief from direct sun. The water is crystal clear n tides r generally calm making it most suitable for sea bath n little games with infants n children. Later we found out its d only beach where one can enjoy d above activities at Neil. Relax n enjoy d beauty of nature!! More

title: nice
review_text:
The beach is good for frolic, jet skiing, scuba and glass boat ride. 
It is clean and during low tide at around 10 am you can walk 5-600 metres into the beach on the corals. 
The glass boat ride is good for those who dont want to scuba dive. The beach is clean and vast. 
Only draw back is the changing rooms. That too is the fault of us own. People start washing clothes and keep others waiting for 15 - 20 mins.

title: bharatpur
review_text: should be there during high tide..eat packed breakfast during the boat ride...dump ur luggage at hotel and reach bharat put

title: Beautiful coral beach
review_text: This is the beach with most activity and crowd. yet you can walk some distance to get some privacy. All water activities can be found here. We tried the boat with glass bottom and ventured in the water to sight some corals & colorful fish. You get food and and can buy souvenirs here. it is very close to the main Jetty. So expect some filth on the beach.

title: Blue Paradise
review_text: Bharatpur on Neil island is one of the most beautiful beaches in Andamans, with shallow floor, clear waters and exotic marine life. We did snorkeling and glass bottom boat ride here and it was much better than any of the havelock beaches. Highly recommended.

title: When you reach Neil, you will believe its worth visiting
review_text: Its a beautiful beach just near the jetty, very approachable as it is walking distance from the jetty. Its serene, calm and amazing view. I loved the color of the sea. Its crystal clear water. We opted for glass bottom boat tour. Its definitely worth it. Not only for the people who are scared of getting into water, but for every one. Water is so clear that you can easily watch the beautiful world of fishes and corals just like that. Its the best beach at Neil.

title: Nice Beach and Good Views
review_text: We visited Bharatpur beach which offers good sandy area and have water sports facilities but water is little dirty and choice is yours you can have water sports on havelock and on north bay.

title: Good ~ Sort of Virgin beach!
review_text:
The beach is isolated and seems to be not frequented by the tourist and is the reason to be called Virgin ! all natures beauty around... 
A bit rocky so going into the water is not very comfortable. Take a walk along the beach and pick up the sea shells in all varieties ~ total peace and calm !

title: Wonderful beach for snorkeling and swimming
review_text: Close to jetty in Neil island. Good options for doing snorkeling and scuba diving. Same experience as Havelock at a cheaper price. Shallow water good for swimming.

title: Gorgeous!
review_text: Beautiful beach. There is a lot to do around like Snorkeling, Scuba Diving, Glass Bottom Boat Riding to view Colorful Corals.

title: never seen before
review_text: fun place, nice for tourists, this is the only beach worth seeing at Neil Island, i have never seen water recede by kms at a beach the way it does at this beach.

title: Place to enjoy he Corals
review_text: Very nice beach. Lot of things you can do there like Snorkeling, Scuba Diving, Glass Bottom Boat Riding to view Colorful Corals. It has one of the biggest, rarest and colorful Corals.

title: not my choice of place...
review_text: i didnt visit the place as it was so sunny and the shore was also not that much good. you can view the beach from the jetty itself it is very nearby

title: Beach
review_text: This beach is very beautiful beach, most of the area is sandy. We involved in playing white sand. Good place for spending couples.

title: Enjoy glass bottom boatride
review_text: View corals through glass bottom boatride for 25-45mins. The beach is not suitable for bathing. Just relax and have fun. You get option to do snorkelling as well.

title: Must visit
review_text: Cleanliness and serene environment at beach. Clear and blue water of the sea made our visit memorable

title: Best beach of Andaman, even better than Radhanagar beach
review_text:
Wonderful beach just near the Jetty of the Neil Island. It is a tidal flat i.e if you go during low tide, you have to walk a bit to reach chest deep water. But what a view. Azure blue water everywhere, transparent with not much wave. With a view of ships arriving and leaving from the Jetty. 
Perfect for a day in the sun and sea. I got less time to spend in this beach, because we stayed more days in Havelock Island to see the much hyped Radhanagar beach. But Bharatpur beach is a real winner. Already seen a lot of Havelock. So will skip Havelock Island and stay entirely in Neil Island during my next trip just for this lovely beach. More

title: This area is where you can swim and walk out to a large sandbar
review_text: I liked it because they offered here glass bottomed boat rides, rides on sea do's. You could just relax on the beach and their were vendors there where you could buy drinks ,food and trinkets.

title: blue water golden sand
review_text: brilliant beach with blue water and golden sand, water sports activities are available at the beach , Speed boat is a very good experience. Snorkelling here is much better than havelock island.

title: Awesome beach
review_text: Beautiful crystal clear water. Best place for snorkeling. Bargain with the operators, you might get a discount on glass boat ride and snorkeling. We got it for Rs.700 per head when they were asking for 1000.

title: Crystal clear water
review_text:
Go for snorkeling here.. Water is clearest in Andaman. 
Better than Havelock, if not interested in water sports or have already done a lot and don't wanna do it, then avoid..

title: You can skip this if you are going to Havelock.
review_text: If you doing snorkeling/scuba in Havelock you can skip doing it in Bharatput. In Havelock you see lot of fish where are in Bharatpur you can see many variety. The coral is also great. But if you are visiting Havelock you can skip Bharatpur.

title: Good for underwater activities
review_text: Good for underwater viewing like snorkelling n glass bottom boat ride as water is very clear n it has a wide variety of fishes etc.

title: Good activeties
review_text:
The best place to relax and have fun at Neil Island. From here you can do glass bottom boat rides, snorkelling, diving etc. Neil's water is the best out of all other snorkelling points in andaman. Though jolly buoy has more varieties of fish neil is better due to clarity of water. 

Do snorkelling if possible and strike a deal which booking boat rides etc. You can negotiate and people are helpful. I suggest you carry your own snorkelling equipment and they you can snorkel more. Remember the real beauty of Neil island is under water.

title: Excellent Beach
review_text:
This place is a perfect place for beach lover as you can relax on the beach for hours together as there is a lot of shade, options for so good snacks, and on the top the you can enjoy the water activities here. If the tides are low, then you would be more lucky as you can enjoy in the water even 200-300 feet (may be even more) from the shore. 

We loved snorkling and glass bottom ride here. Even the beach for perfect to capture great pictures. 

We spent almost 6 hr on the beach and was not bored at all....

title: Beautiful beach with much activities
review_text:
I liked Glass bottom boat and snorkeling. 
I liked the deep white sand and blue sea. 
It is a small beach but I enjoyed here.

title: Best beach quite unexplored
review_text:
Had a cheapest glass boat ride to witness amazing marine life. By looking at the variety of corals, I got zapped. I never thought it would be so good. 

This is quite ideal for snorkeling, as this beach remains unpolluted. 

Enjoy the best moments of this site.

title: Great Place for Snorkelling and Glass bottom ride.
review_text:
Great place for snorkelling, way better than Havelock. Also the glass bottom is good, with lots of Corals. 
Probably the only place in Andamans where they take you out on boat to the sea for Snorkelling. 
About 700 for special Snorkelling & Glass bottom ride. 
You can just take the special Snorkelling trip and get the glass bottom ride free as you will be waiting with others on the boat.

title: Beach where all the water sports are.
review_text: I prefer calm beaches and this is not one of the calm beaches where you can relax on your own. All the water sports activities are held in this beach and hence there is lot of actiivity and a lot of crowd. Do go for snorkelling here and the glass boat ride. I would even recommend scuba diving here since there are lots of fishes.

title: Nothing special
review_text: If you are back from Havelock, then acativitis available here is basic. Everything is costlier than in Havelock. The corals here is suppose to be better. The glass bottom ride we took amid bad weather was sheer wastage of money, specially when we went scuba diving at Havelock. I will advise you not to spend here and utilise that money at activities in Havelock.

title: Nice beach with basic facilities!
review_text: This is not really a very long and serene beach. However, it has basic facilities like washrooms and snack shops - being the most 'commercial' beach on the island. You can enjoy some serenity if you walk away from the main beach front where most of the crowd is (don't walk towards the jetty - but towards the opposite side.) This beach is mostly used as a stopover for people waiting for the their boats (that arrive in the afternoon). As the hotels need you to checkout earlier in the day, people land up here with luggage. You can spend a few hours here if you try out water sports (not really cheap though!) - or just sit on the island with a book, go for a swim in the water (not too deep till 100 mtrs.), buy shell products etc. from the shops lining the beach or just click pictures.
